Title: Un revenant
Writer: Henri Jeanson (dialogue), Henri Jeanson (adaptation), Christian-Jaque (adaptation), Louis Chavance (adaptation), Henri Jeanson (screenplay)
Actors: Louis Jouvet, Gaby Morlay, François Périer, Jean Brochard
Plot: A ballet producer returns to his native town and schemes to avenge himself on the family who tried to murder him 20 years before.
